title: Crypto Weekly Roundup: BTC ETFs Shatter Records, FBI Reports Increase In Fraud, & More
description: Last week was a significant milestone for the industry as it saw Bitcoin create a new all-time high by blasting past the $70K mark. Since then, the premier coin has corrected the surge and settled at $69,755 at the time of reporting.

title: Advanced Email Attack Targets Organizations Worldwide, Threatens NTLM Hash Theft
description: A sophisticated cyber threat, identified as TA577, has unleashed a new wave of email attacks aimed at infiltrating the computer systems and networks of numerous organizations globally. This covert operation, meticulously engineered to steal NTLM hashes – encoded passwords crucial for user authentication in Windows environments, poses a grave security risk. Recent revelations by cybersecurity […]

title: Cloudflare Introduces Firewall for AI to Bolster Security for Large Language Models
description: Cloudflare, a leading provider of internet security and infrastructure services, has unveiled a groundbreaking enhancement to its Web Application Firewall (WAF) suite: Firewall for AI. This new capability aims to fortify protection against cyber threats targeting Large Language Models (LLMs), such as OpenAI’s ChatGPT, by identifying and thwarting potential abuse and attacks before they reach […]

title: Nvidia’s Growth Story: Beyond Hardware
description: Nvidia, the industry giant renowned for its semiconductor chips, has reported staggering growth in its fiscal 2024. With a remarkable 126% year-over-year increase in revenue, reaching a staggering $60.9 billion, the company has solidified its position as a market leader in high-performance GPUs.  This unprecedented growth was largely attributed to soaring demand for its flagship […]

title: Ripple (XRP) and Polygon (MATIC) lose holders’ interest as BlastUP (BLP) draws massive investor inflow
description:
Ethereum’s price could peak at $10,000, according to an analyst’s projection. Meanwhile, interest in Ripple (XRP) and Polygon (MATIC) seem to be dwindling, while BlastUP (BLP) garners massive investor inflow. This cryptocurrency realm turbulence shows the dynamic value shifts in the market, highlighting the potential of Ethereum’s projected pinnacle. BlastUP Presale Exceeds $1 Million: Anticipating […]

title: ARB Price Prediction: Token Unlock and the Effect of Ethereum’s Upgrade
description:
With Arbitrum’s (ARB) token unlock and Ethereum’s (ETH) Dencun Upgrade approaching, two whales have let go of millions of ARB tokens. According to Spot On Chain, the whales deposited 2.77 million tokens into Binance. At the time the participants took the action, the tokens were worth $5.94 million while making $3.29 million in profits.  Arbitrum’s […]
